title: The Fantasy Playbook
description: She’s always living in her head.He’s always out there making plays happen.April has always been the smart, quiet girl. She always plays by the rules and keeps her body and her heart on guard. When an accidental slip exposes her fantasies to the one guy who should never know, sparks fly, and April finds that reality can be so much better than fantasy.Mark loves to make plays, and he’s not afraid to get his hands dirty to get what he wants. Ever since he laid eyes on April, he wanted her. Now, he has the playbook to make it happen.Will they find happily ever after, or are somethings better left as fantasies?Author's note:The Fantasy Playbook is a sexy short by new author Davina Karr. This 30 minute read is her first foray into self-publishing. She's looking forward to publishing full length novels in the future - so check back on the author's work and you might get pleasantly surprised!
author: Davina Karr
